title: Message
description: The message format for communicating with the Arduinos

id.description: The ID of the sending/receiving arduino that the message is for

mType.description: The type of message which is being passed. See arduino-message.md for details.

deviceID.description: The ID of the device which is sending/receiving the data

partID.description: The part which the value refers to. Such as sensor ID or servo ID

value.description: The value of the data being sent. pwm value for a servo or sensor data

error.description: An error code to be sent back from the Arduino with each message. If set to 0 no error.
